CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.NO_CERTIFICATIONS: You are not currently pursuing any certifications.
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.NO_LONGER_WORKING: No longer pursuing this certification or working with this certifier? No problem!
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.UNSUPPORTED_CERTIFICATION_MESSAGE_ONE: LiteFarm doesn’t currently generate documents for this certifier. However, we can export generic forms that are useful for most certifiers. You can select Export to create these forms or
CERTIFICATION_EXPORT.UNSUPPORTED_CERTIFICATION_MESSAGE_TWO: to see if there are new certifiers available in your area.

CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.SUBTITLE_TWO: certifiers we work with in your country.
CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.TITLE: What type of certification?
CERTIFICATION_SELECTION.TOOLTIP: Don't see your certification? LiteFarm is dedicated to supporting sustainable agriculture and certifications are a big part of that. Request another certification here and we'll do our best to incorporate it in the app.

CERTIFIER_SELECTION.INFO: That probably means LiteFarm doesn't currently work with your certifier - sorry! LiteFarm does produce generic forms that are helpful in most cases though.
CERTIFIER_SELECTION.TITLE: Who is your certifier?

INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.PARAGRAPH: Do you plan to pursue or renew a certification this season?
INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.TITLE: Interested in certifications?
INTERESTED_IN_CERTIFICATION.WHY_ANSWER: LiteFarm generates forms required for organic certification. Some information will be mandatory.

REQUEST_CERTIFIER.LABEL: Requested Certifier
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.REQUEST: What certifier would you like to request?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_ONE: We're sorry - we don’t currently work with any
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_THREE: certifiers in your country. Would you like to request one?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.SORRY_TWO: certifiers. Would you like to request one?
REQUEST_CERTIFIER.TITLE: Request a certifier

SUMMARY.BAD_NEWS: LiteFarm doesn't currently collect the information you need to generate your certification documents - sorry!
SUMMARY.BAD_NEWS_INFO: However, we can create generic forms that are useful for most certifiers. We'll indicate this information throughout the app with a leaf icon.
SUMMARY.GOOD_NEWS: Good news! LiteFarm can gather the information you need to generate your certification documents!
SUMMARY.INFORMATION: We'll indicate this information throughout the app with a leaf icon.
SUMMARY.TITLE: You are interested in applying for:

CERTIFICATIONS.COULD_NOT_CONTACT_CERTIFIER: It looks like LiteFarm doesn’t currently export in the format of your certifier. You can still export your documents but your certifier may require additional information. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.FILES_ARE_READY: Your certification files are now ready to export. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.HAVE_ALL_INFO: It looks like LiteFarm has all the information we need to process your certification documents. We’ll send them to you at:
CERTIFICATIONS.NEXT_WE_WILL_CHECK: Next we'll check if your certifier requires any additional information to process your certification submission.
CERTIFICATIONS.NOTE_CANNOT_RESUBMIT: Note: Once you submit the survey you will not be able to edit your answers. To change them after submission, begin a new export.
CERTIFICATIONS.WOULD_LIKE_ANSWERS: Your certifier would like you to answer a few additional questions before we can export your documents.

STEP_ONE.DESCRIPTION: We've added support for certifications and certifiers! Want to see what’s available in your area?
STEP_ONE.TITLE: New feature!

STEP_TWO.DESCRIPTION: That’s okay! You can add certifications and certifiers later under “my farm”.
STEP_TWO.TITLE: Viewing certifications

CROP_CATALOGUE.NO_RESULTS_FOUND: No results found. Please change your filters.
CROP_CATALOGUE.NOMINATE_CROP: Nominate this crop for inclusion in the LiteFarm crop catalogue
CROP_CATALOGUE.NOMINATE_CROP_TOOLTIP: Nominating this crop for inclusion in the LiteFarm crop catalogue grants the LiteFarm team permission to share information about this crop with a specialist in your region. Approved crops will become part of the crop catalogue shown to all users.
CROP_CATALOGUE.SELECT_A_CROP: Select a crop to add it to your farm. Use search and filters to find crops more quickly.

DOWNLOAD_FILE.DEFAULT: Something went wrong. Please contact support@litefarm.org for assistance.
DOWNLOAD_FILE.PARTIAL_SUCCESS_BOTTOM_TEXT: They should now be visible on your farm map. These sensors will be ignored in future uploads
DOWNLOAD_FILE.PARTIAL_SUCCESS_TOP_TEXT: The following sensors in your file uploaded successfully or already exist on your farm:
DOWNLOAD_FILE.SOME_ERRORS: Unfortunately, there were some errors with your upload:

BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.DOWNLOAD_TEMPLATE_LINK_MESSAGE: click here to download the template
BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.EMPTY_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: No sensors found, please check your upload and try again.
BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Upload file must be a csv,

SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.ALREADY_OCCUPIED: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" already registered to another organization, please contact Ensemble support at support@esci.io to troubleshoot.
SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.DOES_NOT_EXIST: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" does not exist in the Ensemble database. Please ensure that you have spelled the External_ID properly for this entry, and that the sensor is an Ensemble sensor.
SENSOR_CLAIM_ERROR.INTERNAL_ERROR: Sensor "{{ sensorId }}" failed to upload successfully, please reach out to LiteFarm support at support@litefarm.org to troubleshoot.

BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.TITLE: Add sensors to map
BULK_UPLOAD_SENSORS.UPLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: There were some issues with your upload.

VALIDATION.EXTERNAL_ID: Invalid external id, must be between 1 and 40 characters.
VALIDATION.FILE_ROW_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: File row limit exceeded. The max number of sensors that can be uploaded from a file is 100.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_BRAND: Invalid brand name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_DEPTH: Invalid depth value, must be between 0 and 1000.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_HARDWARE_VERSION: Invalid hardware version name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_LATITUDE: Invalid latitude value, must be between -85 and 85. and fewer than 10 decimals.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_LONGITUDE: Invalid longitude value, must be between -180 and 180. and fewer than 10 decimals.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_MODEL: Invalid model name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_NAME: Invalid sensor name, must be between 1 and 100 characters.
VALIDATION.SENSOR_READING_TYPES: Invalid reading type detected: {{ reading_types }}. Valid values include: {{ allowed_reading_types }}.

BIODIVERSITY.API_OFFSET_LIMIT_ERROR_MESSAGE: There are too many biodiversity observations within your farm boundary to report accurately, please reduce the size of your farm boundary and try again.
BIODIVERSITY.GENERIC_ERROR_MESSAGE: LiteFarm generates biodiversity insights based on several sources and was unable to do so at this time. Please try again later.
BIODIVERSITY.INFO: Biodiversity is great for people and the planet. We count species richness from all known records of biodiversity within your farm boundary(ies). You can increase the crop biodiversity on your farm by planting new varieties. You can increase the non-crop biodiversity count on your farm by recording sightings on https://inaturalist.org/app

LOADING.BODY: We're generating the latest biodiversity insights for your farm. This can take up to 60 seconds.
LOADING.TITLE: Generating the latest biodiversity insights...

BIODIVERSITY.TITLE: Biodiversity

INSIGHTS.INFO: Insights provides added data insights into what is happening on your farm. The more data you provide in the application, the more insights can be generated. See individual insights for further information.

LABOUR_HAPPINESS.INFO: LiteFarm estimates labour happiness by averaging the satisfaction scores individuals enter when marking a task as completed.
LABOUR_HAPPINESS.TITLE: Labour Happiness

PRICES.INFO: We show you the trajectory of your sales prices against the sales prices for the same goods within a given distance of you, collected across the LiteFarm network.
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS_one: Network price is based on {{count}} farm in your local area
PRICES.NEARBY_FARMS_other: Network price is based on {{count}} farms in your local area
PRICES.NO_ADDRESS: You currently do not have an address in LiteFarm. Please update it in your Profile to get nearby prices information!
PRICES.TITLE: Prices

SOIL_OM.INFO: Soil organic matter is needed to maintain a healthy soil environment for your crops. We populate this insight from your most recent soil analysis task results. If you do not have any data we predict the potential soil organic matter for your location globally.
SOIL_OM.TITLE: Soil OM

INSIGHTS.TITLE: Insights

MANAGEMENT_PLAN.DETAIL_SPOTLIGHT_CONTENTS: Here you can edit your crop details.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.DO_YOU_WANT_TO_ABANDON_CONTENT: Do you want to abandon this plan?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.DURATION_TOOLTIP: These are suggested values. Please adjust for your local conditions.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.EDITING_PLAN_WILL_NOT_MODIFY: Editing this plan will not modify tasks assigned to it.

FIRST_MP_SPOTLIGHT.BODY_PART1: LiteFarm has generated a few tasks based on your plan. You can add more tasks or assign them on this screen.
FIRST_MP_SPOTLIGHT.BODY_PART2: Your plan will become active once you complete a task.
FIRST_MP_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Congrats! You've made your first crop plan!

MANAGEMENT_PLAN.HARVEST_DATE: When do you expect your next harvest?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.HARVEST_TO_DATE_INFO: Harvest to date is calculated based on completed harvest tasks within this crop plan
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.HISTORICAL_CONTAINER_OR_IN_GROUND: Was it planted in a container or in the ground?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.INCOMPLETE_TASK_CONTENT: This plan has tasks that aren’t completed yet. You’ll need to mark the tasks complete in order to complete this crop plan.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.KNOW_HOW_IS_CROP_PLANTED: Do you know how the crop was planted?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.LOCATION_SUBTEXT: Only locations that can grow crops are shown.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.MANAGEMENT_SPOTLIGHT_1: Create new plans for this crop
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.MANAGEMENT_SPOTLIGHT_2: View and modify plans for this crop
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.NEXT_HARVEST: When do you expect your next harvest?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.NOTES_CHAR_LIMIT: Notes must be less than 10,000 characters
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.PLANTED_ALREADY: Will you be planting this crop or is it already in the ground?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.PLANTING_DATE_INFO: Seeding date based on crop age: {{seed_date}}
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.PLANTING_METHOD_TOOLTIP: Selecting the right planting method will help LiteFarm more accurately estimate the quantity of seed needed, yield, and other helpful insights.

REPEATED_MP_SPOTLIGHT.BODY: You can click here to see all crop plans in this group. Modifying an individual crop plan won’t change anything about others in the group.
REPEATED_MP_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Congrats! You’ve created your first repeating crop plan!

ROW_METHOD.HISTORICAL_SAME_LENGTH: Were the rows all the same length?
ROW_METHOD.SAME_LENGTH: Are your rows all the same length?

MANAGEMENT_PLAN.SEED_OR_SEEDLING: How will you plant this crop?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.SEEDLING_AGE: What is the approximate age of the seedling or planting stock?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.SEEDLING_AGE_INFO: Approximate age will help LiteFarm estimate harvest dates for seedlings. For cuttings and other planting stock without an obvious age, you can enter 0.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.SELECTED_STARTING_LOCATION: Always select this as the starting location for crops that will be transplanted
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.TERMINATION_DATE: When will you terminate this crop?

BODY.TEXT: Please indicate where this crop will be initially <1>{{fill}}</1>. We’ll ask about where you’ll transplant it to later.

MANAGEMENT_PLAN.WHAT_IS_AGE: What is the approximate age of the crop?
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.WHAT_WAS_PLANTING_METHOD_INFO: Selecting the right planting method will help LiteFarm more accurately estimate the quantity of seed needed, yield, and other helpful insights.
MANAGEMENT_PLAN.WILD_CROP: Are you harvesting a wild crop?

SPOTLIGHT.SEE_TASK: See what else is going on

NOTIFICATION.NONE_TO_DISPLAY: There are no notifications to display.

TASK_DELETED.BODY: A {{taskType}} task assigned to you has been deleted by {{abandoner}}.

TIMELINE.HEADING: Notification timeline

WEEKLY_UNASSIGNED_TASKS.BODY: You have unassigned tasks due this week.

OUTRO.ALL_DONE: Great! You're all done. Ready to get your hands dirty?
OUTRO.IMPORTANT_THINGS: And finally, let us show you a couple of important things!

PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Your password has been updated. Redirecting you to your farms in 10 seconds...
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS_MODAL.TITLE: Success!

PLAN_GUIDANCE.ADDITIONAL_GUIDANCE: Is there additional guidance you want to provide for this seeding task?
PLAN_GUIDANCE.TOOLTIP: The first 40 characters of this field will display anywhere your crop plan is visible.

PREPARING_EXPORT.MESSAGE: LiteFarm is putting together your certification documents in the background and you’ll receive an email when we’re done - it could take a few minutes... You can click outside this box to continue using LiteFarm without interrupting the process.
PREPARING_EXPORT.TITLE: Your export is being prepared

ACCOUNT.CONVERT_TO_HAVE_ACCOUNT: Convert this worker to a user with account

ERROR.PHONE_NUMBER_LENGTH: Phone number must be fewer than 20 characters

PEOPLE.DO_YOU_WANT_TO_REMOVE: Do you want to remove this user from your farm?
PEOPLE.LAST_ADMIN_ERROR: We’re unable to revoke access to this user because they are the last manager at this farm. If you would like to delete your farm, create a ticket by clicking <1>here</1> instead.
PEOPLE.THIS_WILL_REMOVE: This action will remove the user from your farm.

REMOVE_ANIMALS.MORE_DETAILS: Do you want to give more details?
REMOVE_ANIMALS.REMOVED_AND_ARCHIVED: These animals have been successfully removed from your farm and will be available in your historical inventory.
REMOVE_ANIMALS.WHY: Tell us why you are removing these animals
REMOVE_ANIMALS.WILL_BE_ARCHIVED: These animals will be removed from your active inventory
REMOVE_ANIMALS.WILL_BE_PERMANENTLY_REMOVED: These animals will be permanently removed from your farm

DELETE.MESSAGE: This will remove the revenue from your farm's records. It will no longer be reflected in any financial summaries.

EDIT_REVENUE.RETIRE_REVENUE_MESSAGE: Retiring this revenue type will remove it as a possible choice for future incomes. You can still search and filter for previous incomes of this revenue type on the Finances tab.

ROLE_SELECTION.TITLE: What is your role on the farm?

ADD_SALE.SALE_VALUE_ERROR: Sale value must be a positive number less than 999,999,999

CARROUSEL_TEXT.ESTIMATED_REVENUE: This number (static) reflects your future estimated harvest
CARROUSEL_TEXT.GENERIC: *These numbers are based on your date / filter selection

MANAGE_CUSTOM_EXPENSE_TYPES_SPOTLIGHT.BODY: Here you can add, modify, or retire expense types personalized to your farm.

MANAGE_CUSTOM_REVENUE_TYPES_SPOTLIGHT.BODY: Here you can add, modify, or retire revenue types personalized to your farm.

FINANCES.REPORT_HELP_TEXT: These filters mirror what you see on the Finances overview. You can modify what is exported below.

SEARCH.CLEAR_TERMS: Why not try a different search to discover new possibilities?
SEARCH.CLEAR_TERMS_AND_FILTERS: Why not explore different terms or simply clear the filters to discover new possibilities?
SEARCH.NO_RESULTS_FOR: Sorry, we couldn't find any results for your search term <1>'{{searchTerm}}'</1>

SENSOR.BRAND_HELPTEXT: Brands that LiteFarm can integrate with are shown below. If you would no longer like to use this sensor brand, try retiring this sensor instead.

DETAIL.BRAND_TOOLTIP: Brands that LiteFarm can integrate with are shown below. If you would no longer like to use this sensor brand, try retiring this sensor instead.
DETAIL.EXTERNAL_ID_TOOLTIP: This id is used to uniquely identify this sensor in other, integrated systems and cannot be changed. If it is no longer being used, try retiring this sensor and adding a new one.
DETAIL.NAME: Sensor Name

MODAL.BODY: Changing the reading types for this sensor will modify what readings LiteFarm can show. Do you want to proceed?
MODAL.TITLE: Change reading types?

SENSOR.MODEL_HELPTEXT: This id is used to uniquely identify this sensor in other, integrated systems and cannot be changed. If it is no longer being used, try retiring this sensor and adding a new one.

RETIRE.BODY: Retiring this sensor will remove it and any readings associated with it from your farm as well as closing any connections with the sensor provider. Do you want to proceed?
RETIRE.RETIRE_FAILURE: There was an error retiring this sensor
RETIRE.TITLE: Retire sensor?

SENSOR_READING_CHART_SPOTLIGHT.CONTENT: Individual sensors can be shown or hidden by clicking their labels here.
SENSOR_READING_CHART_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Series can be hidden

SIGNUP.EXPIRED_ERROR: We've updated our infrastructure and you'll need to reset your password. Check your inbox to proceed.

SIGNUP.SSO_ERROR: Please login by clicking the Google button above
SIGNUP.USED_INVITATION_LINK_ERROR: This invitation has already been used, please log in to access this farm
SIGNUP.WRONG_BROWSER: LiteFarm is not optimized for this browser.

REASON.NO_ANIMALS: Auto-abandoned: No animals for this task

ABANDON.TITLE: Abandon task

TASK.ABANDON_TASK_DURATION: Was any work completed for this task?
TASK.ABANDON_TASK_HELPTEXT: Work completed on this abandoned task will be incorporated into labour costs. If no work was completed, please select that instead.
TASK.ANIMALS_AT_LEAST_ONE_TO_COMPLETE: At least one animal must be selected to complete this task. To remove all animals, abandon the task instead.
TASK.COMPLETE_TASK_CHANGES: Did you have to make any changes to this task?
TASK.COMPLETE_TASK_DURATION: How long did the task take to complete?
TASK.COMPLETION_NOTES_CHAR_LIMIT: Notes must be less than 10,000 characters

CREATE.LOCATION_DELETED: Another user has retired your selected location. Please refresh the page to get the most recent status.

DELETE.CANT_DELETE_ABANDON_INSTEAD: Do you want to abandon the crop plan instead?
DELETE.DELETE_TASK_MESSAGE: This task will be removed from your farm. If you would like to keep a record of this task, click "Abandon" instead.

TASK.HOW_WILL_HARVEST_BE_USED: How will the harvest be used?
TASK.NO_LOCATIONS_FOR_TASK: No specific location required for this task
TASK.NO_TASKS_TO_DISPLAY: There are no tasks to display.
TASK.QUANTITY_CANNOT_EXCEED: Harvest quantity used cannot exceed amount to allocate
TASK.SELECT_WILD_CROP: This task targets a wild crop

BETA.TITLE: Beta
BETA.ANIMALS_CONTENT: Get a sneak peek at our new animal management feature—now in beta! Your feedback is crucial as we refine this feature. Please share any bugs or suggestions you encounter. We appreciate your help in improving LiteFarm! You can learn more about beta here
